item.title: CEO of drugmaker GSK to step down by year's end

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to meet with Netanyahu at White House
item.description: President Donald Trump is scheduled on Monday to welcome Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to the White House.

item.title: Investigators probe for motive in Michigan LDS church shooting, fire
item.description: The search for more potential victims of a mass shooting at a Michigan church continued into Monday, after a gunman killed at least four people.
